samples.context: Liver is the largest organ in the human body. Liver manufactures bile; which gets stored in gall bladder.
samples.question: What is the largest organ in the human body?

samples.context: Liver manufactures bile; which gets stored in gall bladder. Pancreas is situated below the stomach.
samples.question: Where is the pancreas located in the body?

samples.context: Pancreas is situated below the stomach. It secretes pancreatic juice which contains many digestive enzymes.
samples.question: What does the pancreas secrete?

samples.context: Liver manufactures bile; which gets stored in gall bladder. Pancreas secretes pancreatic juice.
samples.question: What is the function of the liver related to bile?

samples.context: Pancreas is situated below the stomach. It secretes pancreatic juice which contains many digestive enzymes.
samples.question: What role does pancreatic juice play in digestion?
